# HKMetadataKeyMaximumLightIntensity

**Global Variable**

A key that indicates the maximum intensity of light for an outdoor time sample.

## Declaration

```swift
let HKMetadataKeyMaximumLightIntensity: String
```

## Discussion

The expected value type is an [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKQuantity] expressed in [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/lux()].

## Constants

- **HKDataTypeIdentifierStateOfMind**
- **HKMetadataKeyAppleFitnessPlusCatalogIdentifier**
- **HKPredicateKeyPathWorkoutEffortRelationship**
title: HKMetadataKeyMaximumLightIntensity
